meanings.definition: A person who begets or brings into existence
meanings.sent1: The begetter of the idea was the creative thinker.
meanings.sent2: The begetter of the project was the team leader.
meanings.sent3: The begetter of the plan had everyone amazed by their innovation.
meanings.sent4: The begetter of the story spun tales that captivated all who listened.
meanings.sent5: The begetter of the artwork infused it with passion and emotion.

meanings.definition: The male parent of an animal or person
meanings.sent1: The begetter of the puppies was a proud father dog.
meanings.sent2: The begetter of the foal stood proudly beside it.
meanings.sent3: The begetter of the litter was a playful tomcat.
meanings.sent4: The begetter of the cubs watched over them with care.
meanings.sent5: The begetter of the calf nuzzled it affectionately.
